name: OpenMP 3.0 C translator w PThreads rt
short_description: Xomp is a src-to-src translator for most of 3.0. A simple platform for experimentation and optimization of OpenMP implementations and extensions.  Has been tested with C programs but does not parse C. Should be easily adaptable for other languages.
